texts.overview: [color=title]Invisibility[/color] allows you to hide from enemies for a short span of time. During this interval, the enemies will seek your [color=title]last known position[/color].

confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Invisibility[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Pickpocket[/color] skill.
This skill has a very high [color=title]recharge time[/color]. Future upgrades to [color=title]Invisibility[/color] will diminish that recharge time.

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Pickpocket[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The first upgrade to [color=title]Invisibility[/color] slightly extends the duration of the effect. In addition, the skill will now [color=title]recharge[/color] more quickly.

The last upgrade for [color=title]Invisibility[/color] extends the overall duration of the skill. Additionally, [color=title]standing still[/color] while invisible will save [color=title]50%[/color] of the [color=title]timer drain[/color], allowing you to milk extra time out of the skill.
